text: Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti "Yemwe bantu! Mu by’ukuri, njye ndi intumwa ya Allah yoherejwe kuri mwe mwese. (Allah) ni we ufite ubwami bw’ibirere n’isi. Nta yindi mana ibaho itari we, ni we utanga ubuzima akanatanga urupfu". Bityo, nimwemere Allah n’intumwa ye ikaba n’umuhanuzi utari uzi gusoma no kwandika, we wemera Allah akanemera amagambo ye, kandi munamukurikire kugira ngo mubashe kuyoboka
